name: Bloody Glitter
description:
GAME

Fast paced local multiplayer fighting game. 
You play as ponies that grab other ponies to beat each other up using those ponies.

The goal of the game is to cover as much area of cloud Nine, the arena, with pony glitter (and blood) as possible before the time runs out. The player that has the biggest area covered in the end wins the game. 

STORY

Pinky and Violet are living their best magical pony lives high up on cloud Nine.

They love each other and their fellow ponies very much. They play together often and have a lot of fun prancing around rainbows and jumping into the fluffiest of clouds.

They never hesitate to say how much they love each other. This time, however, something went wrong.

Pinky told Violet "I love you the mostest of all the ponies in the world!". 
Violet responded and said "No, I love YOU the most in the entire universe!". 
Pinky could only reply "Noo, I love YOU even more than most!".

This contiued for a whole day and their compliments got more sincere and urgent as time went on. Finally, it turned into a full blown argument!

Uh-Oh... We all know how arguments between magical ponies usually end...

---------

Game made for a Game Jam

January 2023

Janosch Büchi, Elin Giger, Ksenia Ignatenko, Luca Imesch
